results.description: James Gullan scores a brace as Raith Rovers move top of Scottish League One with a 3-1 victory over Stranraer.
results.shortTitle: Raith replace Falkirk at top of League One
results.title: Scottish league One: Raith Rovers replace Falkirk at top

results.description: Listen to Off The Ball and relive today's Scottish Premiership action

results.description: Jim Weir resigns as manager of Forfar Athletic in order to recover fully from the car crash he was involved in back in September.
results.shortTitle: Weir resigns as Forfar Athletic manager
results.title: Forfar Athletic: Jim Weir resigns due to personal reasons

thumbnail.altText: Jim Weir as manager of Forfar

results.description: Falkirk go top of Scottish League One with a win over Forfar Athletic as Raith Rovers and East Fife both lose.
results.shortTitle: Falkirk go top as Fife duo falter
results.title: Scottish League One: Falkirk go top as Raith Rovers and East Fife falter

results.description: Falkirk have announced Mark Campbell's takeover bid for the club has collapsed.
results.title: Falkirk: Mark Campbell takeover collapses

results.description: Follow all the reaction as holders Celtic thrash Hibernian to reach their fourth consecutive Scottish League Cup final.
results.title: 'Some of the football was magnificent' - reaction as Celtic reach League Cup final

results.description: Raith Rovers remain top of Scottish League One by a single goal after being held by second-placed East Fife.
results.shortTitle: Draw keeps Raith top on goal difference
results.title: Scottish League One: Draw keeps Raith top on goal difference

results.description: Two second-half goals from former Scotland striker David Goodwillie denied League One leaders Raith Rovers a victory in Cumbernauld.
results.shortTitle: Goodwillie brace denies win for leaders Raith
results.title: Scottish League One: David Goodwillie brace denies Raith win

results.description: Follow all the reaction to a busy day of Scottish football action, with 16 goals in five Premiership games, shocks in the Championship, and the Scottish Cup second round.
results.title: Reaction to Saturday's Scottish football & Off the Ball

results.description: Bringing back national service, Aston Martins at Gretna and giving controversial David Goodwillie the Clyde captaincy - Danny Lennon discusses life in Scotland's lower leagues.
results.shortTitle: Clyde's Lennon on national service & cars
results.title: National service, Aston Martins & Goodwillie: Danny Lennon's life in Scotland's lower leagues

thumbnail.altText: Danny Lennon in action for Clyde

results.description: Raith Rovers stay top of Scottish League One after coming from two goals behind to draw at home to second-top Falkirk.
results.shortTitle: Raith stay top after draw with Falkirk

results.description: Off the Ball kicks off the day's Scottish football coverage before live text and radio coverage of Saturday's games.
results.title: Listen: Off The Ball & Scottish football reaction

results.description: "Severe" criticism of Scotland's top-flight referees last season was unfair, says former official Hugh Dallas.
results.title: Hugh Dallas: 'Severe' criticism of Scottish referees unfair

results.description: Raith Rovers remain top of Scottish League One with Kieran MacDonald's late winner beating Forfar 2-1.
results.shortTitle: Raith stay top after Forfar victory
results.title: Scottish League One: Raith Rovers stay top with Forfar win

results.description: Grant Anderson's second-half winner helps Raith move to the top of Scottish League One following a 1-0 victory at Airdrieonians.

results.title: Scottish League One: Raith Rovers beat Airdrieonians to move top

results.description: Airdrieonians manager Ian Murray has signed a two-year extension with the Scottish League One club.
results.shortTitle: Airdrie boss Murray signs two-year deal
results.title: Airdrionians: Manager Ian Murray signs new deal

results.description: Forfar Athletic say manager Jim Weir and coach Barry Sellars are "recovering well at home" after being involved in a motorway collision on Monday.
results.title: Forfar Athletic: Jim Weir & Barry Sellars 'recovering well' following motorway collision

results.description: Listen to Off the Ball on BBC Radio Scotland and follow live reaction to all of Saturday's SPFL action.

results.description: Clyde put six past Stranraer while East Fife remain top with 3-1 win against Montrose.
results.shortTitle: Godwillie nets five in Clyde rout
results.title: League One: David Goodwillie scores five in resounding Clyde win

results.description: As part of the Cost of the Game series, we challenged BBC Scotland presenter Amy Irons to get to a game, and buy a ticket, pie and drink, all for 25. Did she manage it?
results.shortTitle: Can Amy Irons get to an SPFL match for 25?
results.title: Cost of the Game: Can Amy Irons get to an SPFL match for 25?
